channel.title: Ghost Dog: The Way of the Samurai (2 Saturdays in February)
channel.description:
Explore the ambivalence between the ideals of a samurai warrior and the code's corruption in the hands of criminals and, more generally the conflict between one's personal desires and one's code of honour.
Is the hit man living a lie? How far can this justification be stretched? Will the path ultimately lead to self-destruction?
Based on the critically acclaimed Jim Jarmusch film Ghost Dog: Way of the Samurai, this game was primarily designed for play with 1 GM/1 PC, but we'll be using the optional rules to bring in a second PC.
With a second character we may explore the relationship between a killer and a cop trying to catch them (like in John Woo's The Killer), or betrayal inside a criminal organisation (as in Infernal Affairs/The Departed), or even a love that makes continuing impossible (as explored in La Femme Nikita). Regardless, our focus will be on a lone honourable killer in a world that has forgotten or abandoned those values.
I am saving a seat for Puckett.
![GhostDog|393x500](upload://9OKzUJamIE4fnlNodi5ySbHr1jy.jpeg)
**Content Warning**: Organised Crime, Violence, Assassination **System**: Tri-Stat **Duration**: Two 3 1/2-hour sessions **Breaks**: Two 5-10 minute breaks **Venue**: Facilitator's Zoom **Recording**: Yes, but made public only with all players' enthusiastic consent! **Attendance**: ***Please only RSVP if you can do so for both sessions.*** **Safety**: Lines & Veils, Script Change, and Open Door Policy. Tools can be changed to suit the players. This game will follow the Gauntlet Community Code of Conduct.
**RSVPs open to all from 19th December at 1pm (GMT)**
